name: Ludi
short_description:
Ludi is an alternative organizer\manager to PC-based video game DRM software and loose video game files.  The purpose is for easy manipulation of games with features such as:

-Integrated configurable 7Zip backup w\ cloud support (Dropbox, etc)
-Ability to write text-based scripts that will manipulate files on a computer (One-click modding)
-Manipulate Steam and games with direct push button commands
-Ability to download games (purchased or freely available) from their respective websites without 1st party applications or going to websites
-Ability to read news from feeds of personally interested websites
-Ability to read social media messages from certain online personalities

Pre-Alpha and in design.  This is a hobby project that I am working on in my spare time.
